00035 #ifndef HARPS_COMPORNENT_ENVELOPE
00036 #define HARPS_COMPORNENT_ENVELOPE
00037 
00038 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00039 #include <harps/clock.hpp>
00040 #include <harps/buffer.hpp>
00041 #include <harps/note.hpp>
00042 #include <harps/normalize.hpp>
00043 #include <harps/config.hpp>

00045 namespace harps {
00046   namespace compornent {
00050     template< unsigned int _clock_select, int _delay, int _attack, int _hold, int _decay, int _sustain, int _release >
00051     class Envelope {
00052       public:
00053         enum {
00054           CACHE_SIZE = 1024
00055         };
00056         Envelope() : last_level ( 0.0f ) {
00057           static const float delay = static_cast< float > ( _delay ) / 1000.0f;
00058           static const float attack = static_cast< float > ( _attack ) / 1000.0f;
00059           static const float hold = static_cast< float > ( _hold ) / 1000.0f;
00060           static const float decay = static_cast< float > ( _decay ) / 1000.0f;
00061           static const float sustain = static_cast< float > ( _sustain ) / 1000.0f;
00062           static const float release = static_cast< float > ( _release ) / 1000.0f;
00063           static const float total = delay + attack + hold + decay;
00064           int index;
00065           for ( index = 0; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ ) {
00066             double time = total * index / CACHE_SIZE;
00067             if ( time < delay ) {
00068               cache[ index ] = 0.0f;
00069               continue;
00070             }
00071             time -= delay;
00072             if ( time < attack ) {
00073               cache[ index ] = time / attack;
00074               continue;
00075             }
00076             time -= attack;
00077             if ( time < hold ) {
00078               cache[ index ] = 1.0f;
00079               continue;
00080             }
00081             time -= hold;
00082             if ( time < decay ) {
00083               cache[ index ] = - time * ( 1.0f - sustain ) / decay + 1.0f;
00084               continue;
00085             }
00086           }
00087         }
00088         template< typename SampleType >
00089         inline void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00090           static const float delay = static_cast< float > ( _delay ) / 1000.0f;
00091           static const float attack = static_cast< float > ( _attack ) / 1000.0f;
00092           static const float hold = static_cast< float > ( _hold ) / 1000.0f;
00093           static const float decay = static_cast< float > ( _decay ) / 1000.0f;
00094           static const float sustain = static_cast< float > ( _sustain ) / 1000.0f;
00095           static const float release = static_cast< float > ( _release ) / 1000.0f;
00096           static const float total = delay + attack + hold + decay;
00097           int index;
00098           typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00099           if ( _note.getStatus() == Note::NOTE_ON ) {
00100             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00101               double time = _clock.template getTime< _clock_select > ( index );
00102               if ( time < total )
00103                 raw_buffer[ index ] = cache[ static_cast<int> ( time / total * CACHE_SIZE ) ];
00104               else
00105                 raw_buffer[ index ] = sustain;
00106             }
00107             last_level = raw_buffer[ SAMPLE_COUNT - 1 ];
00108             _buffer.requestContinue();
00109           }
00110           else if ( _note.getStatus() == Note::NOTE_OFF && last_level != 0.0f ) {
00111             bool end = false;
00112             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00113               double time = _clock.template getTime< _clock_select > ( index );
00114               raw_buffer[ index ] = last_level - time * last_level / release;
00115               if ( raw_buffer[ index ] <= 0.0f ) {
00116                 raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00117                 end = true;
00118               }
00119             }
00120             if ( end ) {
00121               last_level = 0.0f;
00122               _buffer.requestEnd();
00123             }
00124             else
00125               _buffer.requestContinue();
00126           }
00127           else {
00128             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00129               raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00130             _buffer.requestEnd();
00131           }
00132         }
00133       private:
00134         float last_level;
00135         float cache[ CACHE_SIZE ];
00136     };
00140     template< unsigned int _clock_select, int _delay, int _attack, int _hold, int _decay, int _release >
00141     class Envelope< _clock_select, _delay, _attack, _hold, _decay, 0, _release > {
00142       public:
00143         enum {
00144           CACHE_SIZE = 1024
00145         };
00146         Envelope() : last_level ( 0.0f ) {
00147           static const float delay = static_cast< float > ( _delay ) / 1000.0f;
00148           static const float attack = static_cast< float > ( _attack ) / 1000.0f;
00149           static const float hold = static_cast< float > ( _hold ) / 1000.0f;
00150           static const float decay = static_cast< float > ( _decay ) / 1000.0f;
00151           static const float release = static_cast< float > ( _release ) / 1000.0f;
00152           static const float total = delay + attack + hold + decay;
00153           int index;
00154           for ( index = 0; index != CACHE_SIZE; index++ ) {
00155             double time = total * index / CACHE_SIZE;
00156             if ( time < delay ) {
00157               cache[ index ] = 0.0f;
00158               continue;
00159             }
00160             time -= delay;
00161             if ( time < attack ) {
00162               cache[ index ] = time / attack;
00163               continue;
00164             }
00165             time -= attack;
00166             if ( time < hold ) {
00167               cache[ index ] = 1.0f;
00168               continue;
00169             }
00170             time -= hold;
00171             if ( time < decay ) {
00172               cache[ index ] = - time / decay + 1.0f;
00173               continue;
00174             }
00175           }
00176         }
00177         template< typename SampleType >
00178         inline void operator() ( Buffer< SampleType > &_buffer, CurrentTime &_clock, Note &_note ) {
00179           static const float delay = static_cast< float > ( _delay ) / 1000.0f;
00180           static const float attack = static_cast< float > ( _attack ) / 1000.0f;
00181           static const float hold = static_cast< float > ( _hold ) / 1000.0f;
00182           static const float decay = static_cast< float > ( _decay ) / 1000.0f;
00183           static const float release = static_cast< float > ( _release ) / 1000.0f;
00184           static const float total = delay + attack + hold + decay;
00185           int index;
00186           typename Buffer< SampleType >::SampleType *raw_buffer = _buffer.get();
00187           if ( _note.getStatus() == Note::NOTE_ON ) {
00188             bool is_sustain = false;
00189             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00190               double time = _clock.template getTime< _clock_select > ( index );
00191               if ( time < total )
00192                 raw_buffer[ index ] = cache[ static_cast<int> ( time / total * CACHE_SIZE ) ];
00193               else {
00194                 raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00195                 is_sustain = true;
00196               }
00197             }
00198             last_level = raw_buffer[ SAMPLE_COUNT - 1 ];
00199             if ( is_sustain )
00200               _buffer.requestEnd();
00201             else
00202               _buffer.requestContinue();
00203           }
00204           else if ( _note.getStatus() == Note::NOTE_OFF && last_level != 0.0f ) {
00205             bool end = false;
00206             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ ) {
00207               double time = _clock.template getTime< _clock_select > ( index );
00208               raw_buffer[ index ] = last_level - time * last_level / release;
00209               if ( raw_buffer[ index ] <= 0.0f ) {
00210                 raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00211                 end = true;
00212               }
00213             }
00214             if ( end ) {
00215               last_level = 0.0f;
00216               _buffer.requestEnd();
00217             }
00218             else
00219               _buffer.requestContinue();
00220           }
00221           else {
00222             for ( index = 0; index != SAMPLE_COUNT; index++ )
00223               raw_buffer[ index ] = 0.0f;
00224             _buffer.requestEnd();
00225           }
00226         }
00227       private:
00228         float last_level;
00229         float cache[ CACHE_SIZE ];
00230     };
00231   }
00232 }
